name: extract_date_tokens

parameters.name: column_id
parameters.label: Column
parameters.description: The column to which you want to apply this action

parameters.name: row_id
parameters.label: Row
parameters.description: The row to which you want to apply this action

parameters.name: scope
parameters.label: Scope
parameters.description: The transformation scope (CELL | ROW | COLUMN | DATASET)

parameters.name: filter
parameters.label: Filter
parameters.description: An optional filter to apply action on matching values only.

parameters.name: YEAR
parameters.label: Year
parameters.description: Extract year from date (08/24/2015 -> 2015)

parameters.name: QUARTER
parameters.label: Quarter of the year
parameters.description: Extract quarter of the year from date (08/24/2015 -> 3)

parameters.name: MONTH
parameters.label: Month of the year
parameters.description: Extract month of the year from date (08/24/2015 -> 8)

parameters.name: MONTH_LABEL
parameters.label: Name of the month
parameters.description: Extract the name of the month from date (08/24/2015 -> August)

parameters.name: WEEK_OF_YEAR
parameters.label: Week of the year
parameters.description: Extract the week number of the year

parameters.name: DAY_OF_YEAR
parameters.label: Day of the year
parameters.description: Extract the day of year. This has values from 1 to 365 in standard years and 1 to 366 in leap years

parameters.name: DAY
parameters.label: Day of the month
parameters.description: Extract day of the month from date (08/24/2015 -> 24)

parameters.name: DAY_OF_WEEK
parameters.label: Day of the week
parameters.description: Extract the day of week, (1, 2, ... , 7)

parameters.name: DAY_LABEL
parameters.label: Name of the day
parameters.description: Extract the name of the day from date (08/24/2015 -> Monday)

parameters.name: HOUR_12
parameters.label: Hour of the day (12-hour clock)
parameters.description: Extract the hour of the day (from an AM/PM format), from 0 to 11

parameters.name: AM_PM
parameters.label: am (0) or pm (1)
parameters.description: Extract the AM/PM information of the day, from 0 (AM) to 1 (PM)

parameters.name: HOUR_24
parameters.label: Hour of the day (24-hour clock)
parameters.description: Extract the hour of the day, from 0 to 23

parameters.name: MINUTE
parameters.label: Minute
parameters.description: Extract minute from hour

parameters.name: SECOND
parameters.label: Second
parameters.description: Extract second from minute

parameters.name: LANGUAGE
parameters.description: Language for the month and day names
parameters.label: Language

description: Create columns with year, month, day, hour, minute, second, etc.
label: Extract date parts

name: replace_on_value

parameters.name: column_id
parameters.description: The column to which you want to apply this action
parameters.label: Column

parameters.name: row_id
parameters.description: The row to which you want to apply this action
parameters.label: Row

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The transformation scope (CELL | ROW | COLUMN | DATASET)
parameters.label: Scope

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: An optional filter to apply action on matching values only.
parameters.label: Filter

parameters.name: cell_value
parameters.description: The current value
parameters.label: Search for

parameters.name: replace_value
parameters.description: The new value to set
parameters.label: Replace with

parameters.name: replace_entire_cell
parameters.description: Defines greedy level. If checked, it will overwrite the entire cell, if not, it will only replace the part of the value that matches
parameters.label: Overwrite entire cell

description: Replace cells or parts of cells which contain a specific value
label: Search and replace
